text: The national flag of Grenada was created in 1974. == Appearance == It has a large rectangle with the large red border around it with six gold five-pointed stars with three centered on the top border and three centered on the bottom border divided into four triangles of gold (top and bottom) and green (hoist- side and fly-side) with the red disk superimposed at the centre bearing the gold five-pointed star and the nutmeg pod on the hoist-side of the triangle. Grenada Category:Grenada
title: Flag of Grenada
